definition: the act or an instance of diverting or straying from a course, activity, or use : deviation
examples: Bad weather forced the diversion of several flights.

definition: something that diverts or amuses : pastime
examples: Hiking is one of her favorite diversions.
a welcome diversion from the pressures of the job

definition: an attack or feint that draws the attention and force of an enemy from the point of the principal operation
examples: You create a diversion while I sneak inside the building.
